div.p: This page is here mostly for myself to provide links but since every now and then some snooper finds his way here, I feel obliged to provide some quasi-useful information of myself. Be greeted, stranger.

What do I do?
Nerdy stuff: Math, physics and the related. Also trying to avoid growing up. Some things I have done are listed in my CV. Some more recent and less significant achievements and thoughts can be read here*
Where am I?
Back in Finland. If you wish to contact me, you can do so by email: juho.happola@iki.fi
What interests me?
Great mysteries of nature: Is the Schrödinger's cat dead or alive? Where do all the pairless socks lose their pairs? Can a woman be modelled with a finite amount of logical ports? How come I have to study physics for years to know what do when they run into other electrons but the electron does not need to open a single textbook?

Some lecture material* for Tfy-0.3211 Continuation course on Quantum Mechanics
A little helper script for uploading exams to tenttiarkisto.fi*
Other material relating to courses Tfy-0.3201 and Tfy-0.3141 I have removed on kind request from course staff since they feel it is too much of use for people willing to plagiarise. Contact me if you want access to it.

Howto and supporting material for designing and sewing your own bow tie. Some kayaking stuff,
some more, and some gps-tinkering with the kayak.

A bug, 2DO: install GNU/Linux as soon as some nerd fixes this first.

Links marked with "*" lead to non-English content.
This page was last updated on 2.7.2011
